H2O for Life Campaign for Kenya School

PEM's JH Science Club is running a campaign drive to raise $1000 for its partner school in Kenya. The funds will go to H20 for Life. H2O for Life is providing a solution to the water crisis by creating partnerships between schools in the United States and schools in Africa to support clean water, sanitation and hygiene education projects.

Students in the JH are collecting donations and fund raising, but PEM community members may also contribute by going to this link: https://www.h2oforlifeschools.org/donate?campaign=1137 Contributions are tax deductible.
